alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western McIntosh and western Pittsburg Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1042 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Horntown to 5 miles south of Gerty to 2 miles southeast of Olney. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Kiowa... Savanna... Indianola... Hanna... Ashland... Raiford... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Scipio... Pittsburg... Arpelar... Vernon... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 245 and 250. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
